song.title: Badman & Rubish Bin in the Blizzard
song.info:
Here is a great ambient video game song… After have lost the glacial sound track for Bilou’s Adventure, i started another one for our heroes Badman & Rubish Bin that should go through a polar level after the toy factory in the 3rd episode.
project game : Badman III, homebrew video game by PPP Team Software project download : http://www.aderack.com/game- maker/index.php?title=Badman_III:_Badboys_Are_Back!
